item.description: The other day I was on a quest to lower a bit our Azure spending. Im my current company we have several environment that we use for different purposes, Development, Test, Acceptance and so on. All these environments have slightly different tiers for various services and I was wondering how to lower App Service Plan tier outside business hours. App Services have some built-in, albeit limited, capabilities to scale but this only involves scaling out.
